body.p: Born on April 28, 1844 in Augusta, Georgia. Studied medicine in 1863, graduating from Louisville University in 1867. Married Lizzie Loving with whom he had one son, Norbern. He married Bell Leavell with whom he had L.G. Alexander Jr. and Mary Ann Leavell. Died on March 19, 1884 in Hopkinsville, Kentucky.
